static_network_config.network_yaml:
interfaces:
- name: bond0
  type: bond
  state: up
  ipv4:
    dhcp: true
    enabled: true
  link-aggregation:
    mode: balance-rr
    options:
      miimon: '140'
    slaves:
    - ens3
    - ens4
